testsuite.name: com.expedia.pages.SearchPage
testsuite.system-out:
Step 1 : Click on Packages tab.
Step 2 : Click on Leaving From field.
Step 3 : Enter from location.
Message : Leaving From : Paris
Message : Total Leaving Location Name :4
Message : Pick Up Name :Paris (CDG - Roissy-Charles de Gaulle) France
Message : Pick Up Name :Paris (PAR - All Airports) France
Message : ===========================================
Message : You Selected Leaving Name : Paris (PAR - All Airports) France
Step 4 : Click on Going To field.
Step 5 : Enter to location.
Message : Leaving From : Brazil
Message : Total Going Location Name :9
Message : Going To Name :Rio de Janeiro (RIO - All Airports) Brazil
Message : Going To Name :Rio de Janeiro Rio de Janeiro State, Brazil
Message : Going To Name :Rio de Janeiro (GIG - Galeão-Antonio Carlos Jobim Intl.) Brazil
Message : Going To Name :Sao Paulo São Paulo State, Brazil
Message : Going To Name :Fortaleza Ceará, Brazil
Message : ===========================================
Message : You Selected Going Name : Fortaleza Ceará, Brazil
Step 6 : Click on DatePicker field.
Message : February 2025/28
Message : March 2025/10
Step 7 : Click on DatePicker Done field.
Step 8 : Click on Travellers field.
Step 9 : Click on Adults Increase Button.
Step 10 : Click on Children Increase Button.
Step 11 : Select Children Age.
Message : You selected age of child is : 5
Step 12 : Where will the infants sit..??
Step 13 : Click On Done.
Step 14 : Click on Search Button. PASS : searchForPackages
